title: Annoying Lag Spikes
body: I have been getting lag spikes that go from my normal ping up to about 200-500 every 5 seconds for the past month or so, I thought it was my internet so I didn't do anything for awhile and waited for my new internet to come in the next month, i got my upgraded internet with a new modem and cords etc and it works fine on other laptops in my house but my laptop always spikes, I haven't changed anything to cause the lag spikes and im in desperate need of someone to tell me how to fix it, please help.  This isn't just for league im sorry but am desperate.

replies.body: Potentially an issue with your laptop and wireless? I'd try plugging it in via cable, to the modem/router at your house and test again.
Tried using an ethernet cable just stays the same if not worse, it must be my laptop because it isn't happening to any other laptop in my house.
I've had for past month and it isn't just on league haha

me too, just had a ranked game where my ping was fluctuating from 40-130 the whole game, sucked. ive noticed a few other people lagging/disconnecting over the past day or so, so im assuming its a server issue.{{champion:3}}
